part1_ratings.video_summary: A key road event, captured by what appears to be a stationary camera, depicts an instance of dangerous and rash driving behavior in Colombia. A motorcyclist, wearing a plaid shirt and jeans, was observed performing a risky stunt by standing on the seat of a small, red motorcycle with white handlebars while it was moving. The rider maintained balance while holding the handlebars. This action constitutes traffic rule violations such as reckless driving and performing stunts on a public road.
distractor_answers: A semi-truck jackknifed on a slippery road.
Two trucks were involved in a minor fender-bender.
A car cut off a semi-truck, causing it to brake suddenly.

captions.text: Caught this on Thursday morning 😅 what a ride!

A stationary camera in Colombia recorded a motorcyclist, dressed in a plaid shirt and jeans, performing a stunt by standing on the seat of a moving red motorcycle while holding the handlebars, constituting a traffic violation. #Colombia #RoadSafety
Standing on a moving motorcycle is not just reckless—it’s a blatant disregard for traffic laws and public safety. Don’t glorify lawbreakers; reject dangerous stunts and demand real responsibility.

part1_ratings.video_summary: A dashcam video captured a near-miss accident in Canada, near Cornwall, Ontario. The key road event involved a semi-trailer truck performing an unsafe lane change, potentially without signaling or checking mirrors, nearly colliding with another vehicle (possibly a truck) traveling in the adjacent lane. The incident highlights potential traffic rule violations including unsafe lane change, failure to signal, and failure to check mirrors.
part1_ratings.road_event_answer: A semi-truck made an unsafe lane change, nearly colliding with another vehicle.
distractor_answers: A semi-truck jackknifed on a slippery road.
Two trucks were involved in a minor fender-bender.
A car cut off a semi-truck, causing it to brake suddenly.

captions.text: Near-miss in Cornwall, Ontario: semi-truck’s unsafe lane change almost causes crash with another vehicle. 🚚 #CanadaRoads
I just had a wild near-miss with a semi in Cornwall, Ontario! #trucking

Semi-trailer trucks pulling moves like this—unsafe lane changes, no signal, barely a glance—almost as if mirrors are just for decoration. Near Cornwall, Ontario, another close call caught on dashcam. #RoadSafety #TruckAccidents

part1_ratings.video_summary: A daytime near-miss incident involving dangerous driving behavior was captured by a vehicle-mounted camera in Osaka, Japan. The key road event involved the camera vehicle and a right-turning vehicle. The right-turning vehicle made a sudden and dangerous right turn, nearly colliding with the camera vehicle. This maneuver was likely due to the driver of the right-turning vehicle not paying attention or being impatient, resulting in a failure to yield right-of-way. The incident could have been avoided if the right-turning vehicle had waited for a clear opportunity to turn and checked for oncoming traffic.
part1_ratings.road_event_answer: A vehicle makes a sudden, dangerous right turn, failing to yield and nearly colliding with the camera vehicle.
distractor_answers: A group of motorcyclists were participating in an organized race.
A car collided with a motorcycle at an intersection.
A pedestrian was nearly hit by a speeding motorcycle.

captions.text: I nearly got hit by a reckless right-turning driver who didn’t even bother to yield. Some people never learn. #drivingfail
Dashcam footage from Osaka captures a tense moment as a right-turning car fails to yield, narrowly missing the camera vehicle. Grateful this near-miss ended safely. 🚗💥 #RoadSafety #DashcamDrama
Was I just supposed to guess that car was about to dart in front of me? Near-miss moments like this really make me wonder… 🚗💥 Anyone else get surprised by these moves? #RoadRage

part1_ratings.video_summary: A daytime road event in Hyderabad, India, captured by a hand-held or cell-phone camera, depicts multiple traffic violations endangering pedestrian safety. The key event involved vehicles, including an orange car, failing to stop at a red light and making illegal U-turns. Other vehicles also did not stop before zebra crossings, while an auto-rickshaw was observed obstructing a lane. Pedestrians were seen crossing the road even though their signal was still red, amidst the disregard for traffic rules by drivers.
part1_ratings.road_event_answer: Multiple vehicles run a red light and make illegal U-turns while pedestrians are crossing against their signal.
distractor_answers: A cyclist ran a red light and was almost hit by a car.
Two cars collided at high speed on a motorway.
A driver was ticketed for using a phone while driving through a roundabout.

captions.text: Did I just see everyone ignore the red light, or am I missing some new rule here?
I watched drivers run red lights, ignore zebra crossings, and make illegal U-turns while pedestrians crossed on a red. It’s frustrating seeing such disregard for safety.
I just watched Hyderabad chaos—wow, what a show! 🚦🤯 #Hyderabad

part1_ratings.video_summary: A dashcam video captured a dangerous driving incident in Japan, involving a large truck, oncoming traffic, and the dashcam vehicle. The key road event was a hazardous overtaking maneuver performed by the large truck. The truck driver executed a dangerous overtake despite the presence of oncoming traffic, suggesting impatience or being in a rush. This action resulted in evident traffic violations, including illegal overtaking and potentially crossing solid lane markings.
distractor_answers: A cyclist ran a red light and was almost hit by a car.
Two cars collided at high speed on a motorway.
A driver was ticketed for using a phone while driving through a roundabout.

captions.text: My heart nearly stopped—a huge truck just decided to overtake in front of me, ignoring oncoming cars like it’s nothing! Seriously, never try this chaos. Stay patient. #RoadSafety
That truck driver in Japan is unbelievable. Complete disregard for everyone. #JapanRoads
Reckless truck overtaking in Japan puts lives at risk, ignoring oncoming traffic and road rules. 🚛 #TrafficViolation #Japan

part1_ratings.video_summary: The video, captured in Chicago, United States, from multiple street-level and elevated camera perspectives across morning, afternoon, and dusk, showcases an urban environment with various road entities. Cyclists are observed riding in designated lanes, pedestrians are using crosswalks, and vehicles including cars, trucks, and buses are moving in both directions. All road users are seen respecting traffic signals, crosswalks, and lane markings, highlighting safe cycling infrastructure and general road safety awareness. No apparent traffic rule violations are observed, as all road users appear to be following proper traffic regulations.
distractor_answers: A cyclist ran a red light and was almost hit by a car.
Two cars collided at high speed on a motorway.
A driver was ticketed for using a phone while driving through a roundabout.

captions.text: Chicago streets show how safe cycling lanes and attentive road users make a difference. 🚴‍♂️ Pedestrians, cyclists, and vehicles all follow the rules. #RoadSafety
Isn’t it interesting how on a typical morning, afternoon, or dusk, everyone just goes about their way, following signals and lanes? Does anyone even notice the calm routine?
Chicago roads looking smooth today, don’t you think? 🚲

part1_ratings.video_summary: A vehicle-mounted camera on a motorcycle captured a key road event during daytime in Bangalore, India, depicting reckless and dangerous driving behavior by the motorcycle rider in heavy traffic. The road entities involved included the motorcycle, cars, auto-rickshaws, trucks, buses, and trees lining the streets. The motorcyclist was observed riding recklessly, maneuvering dangerously between buses and other vehicles, riding without hands on the steering, and making inappropriate gestures. Evident traffic violations included using a hidden or foldable license plate, reckless driving, and dangerous maneuvering.
distractor_answers: A semi-truck jackknifed on a slippery road.
Two trucks were involved in a minor fender-bender.
A car cut off a semi-truck, causing it to brake suddenly.

captions.text: @blrcitytraffic Another reckless biker risking lives—caught on cam weaving through heavy traffic, riding hands-free, and hiding their license plate. This dangerous behavior is unacceptable! 🚨 Strict action is needed now.
Motorcyclist seen weaving through Bangalore traffic, hands off controls, plate hidden. #RoadSafety

part2_comparisons.video_summary: A vehicle-mounted camera captured a traffic violation at night in Brampton, Ontario, Canada. A car stopped at an intersection with traffic lights, positioning itself incorrectly beyond the designated stop line while the light was red. The road surface was wet during the event.
part2_comparisons.road_event_answer: A car stops beyond the designated stop line at a red light.
distractor_answers: A group of motorcyclists were participating in an organized race.
A car collided with a motorcycle at an intersection.
A pedestrian was nearly hit by a speeding motorcycle.
part2_comparisons.caption_A: Brampton nights really bringing out the creative drivers 😂. Wet roads and wild stops! #Brampton
part2_comparisons.caption_B: Brampton nights really bringing out the creative drivers 😂. Wet roads and wild stops! #Brampton

part2_comparisons.video_summary: A near-miss incident, captured by a vehicle-mounted camera from a driver's perspective in Australia, involved a motorcycle and a truck. The truck was in the process of turning when a motorcyclist approached at high speed. To avoid a collision, the motorcyclist performed a tactical roll. The primary reason for this near-miss was the motorcyclist's failure to slow down when approaching the turning truck, suggesting recklessness or lack of caution. The incident could have been prevented if the motorcyclist had reduced speed. Associated traffic rule violations include speeding and potentially reckless driving by the motorcyclist.
distractor_answers: A vehicle was pulled over by police for speeding in the right lane.
Heavy traffic caused a complete standstill on the motorway.
A driver was changing lanes without using a turn signal.
part2_comparisons.caption_A: Did anyone else catch that close call with the motorbike and turning truck? Glad everyone’s okay—@SafeDrivingAU, is this a common risk on the roads?
part2_comparisons.caption_B: Did anyone else catch that close call with the motorbike and turning truck? Glad everyone’s okay—@SafeDrivingAU, is this a common risk on the roads?

part2_comparisons.video_summary: A vehicle-mounted camera, providing a driver's perspective, captured a road event in Japan during daytime. The key event depicted dangerous driving behavior, specifically illegal turns and lane changes at intersections. A beginner driver's car (possibly a Wagon R) and a yellow car (possibly a Vitz) were observed making illegal turns or lane changes at intersections, cutting across lanes inappropriately. Traffic rule violations included illegal lane changes, improper turns at intersections, and potentially running yellow lights, involving these vehicles, traffic lights, and other vehicles in traffic.
distractor_answers: A vehicle was pulled over by police for speeding in the right lane.

part2_comparisons.caption_B: Is following basic traffic rules too much to ask? 🤨 #fail

part2_comparisons.video_summary: A severe car accident occurred during the pre-dawn hours near Kasa bridge on the Mumbai-Ahmedabad Highway in India. A white high-end car, traveling at high speed, smashed into a road divider before colliding head-on with a luxury bus. Speeding was identified as the primary cause and traffic violation. The accident resulted in multiple fatalities and injuries. The high-end car sustained severe damage, with its front end completely destroyed, hood crumpled, windshield shattered, and passenger-side door hanging open. The video, captured by a hand-held camera, shows static close-up shots of the damaged vehicle.
distractor_answers: A vehicle was pulled over by police for speeding in the right lane.
Heavy traffic caused a complete standstill on the motorway.
A driver was changing lanes without using a turn signal.
part2_comparisons.caption_A: Speed’s shadow can leave nothing but silence and shattered dreams. Each journey is a reminder—roads demand respect, or consequences will follow. Drive as if every mile matters.
part2_comparisons.caption_B: Speed’s shadow can leave nothing but silence and shattered dreams. Each journey is a reminder—roads demand respect, or consequences will follow. Drive as if every mile matters.

part2_comparisons.video_summary: The video, captured by multiple cameras including surveillance and indoor types, depicts key road events involving unsafe driving behavior, improper U-turns, and various traffic violations in Hyderabad, India, specifically in areas like Gachibowli and Abdullahpurmet. These events occurred during both daytime and nighttime. The road entities involved include cars, motorcycles, buses, and pedestrians, interacting with U-turns, traffic signals, road dividers, and zebra crossings. Actions observed include improper U-turns, overtaking, speeding, wrong-side driving, and red light jumping. The depicted traffic rule violations encompass improper U-turns, wrong-side driving, red light jumping, speeding, lane discipline violations, and helmet rule violations.
distractor_answers: A vehicle was pulled over by police for speeding in the right lane.

A driver was changing lanes without using a turn signal.

part2_comparisons.video_summary: A near-miss incident occurred at night near Marathahalli, India, captured by a 4K dashcam. A car, driving straight with the right of way, was almost collided with by a motorcycle. The motorcyclist failed to yield to the car, stopping at the last moment, which constituted a traffic rule violation. It was suggested that the biker might have been rushing to meet delivery targets. The incident could have been avoided if the biker had yielded and both parties had practiced defensive driving.
distractor_answers: A vehicle was pulled over by police for speeding in the right lane.
Heavy traffic caused a complete standstill on the motorway.
A driver was changing lanes without using a turn signal.

part2_comparisons.caption_B: @BlrCityPolice Marathahalli got its own Fast & Furious last night—biker’s need for speed almost turned car into a bumper sticker.

part2_comparisons.video_summary: A vehicle-mounted camera or dashcam captured a dangerous driving incident and traffic violation in Japan during daylight hours. The key road event involved an elderly driver's car, the recorder's vehicle, and lane markings. The elderly driver improperly continued straight from a lane clearly designated for left turns, while the recorder's vehicle honked to alert the driver of the violation. The traffic rule violation was improper lane usage.
distractor_answers: A vehicle was pulled over by police for speeding in the right lane.
Heavy traffic caused a complete standstill on the motorway.
A driver was changing lanes without using a turn signal.
part2_comparisons.caption_A: I just witnessed an elderly driver blatantly ignore the lane markings and go straight from a left-turn-only lane, right in front of my dashcam. I had to honk to warn them—seriously, why do some people act like the rules don’t apply to them? It’s reckless and dangerous. We need stricter enforcement! #TrafficViolation #RoadSafety
part2_comparisons.caption_B: I just witnessed an elderly driver blatantly ignore the lane markings and go straight from a left-turn-only lane, right in front of my dashcam. I had to honk to warn them—seriously, why do some people act like the rules don’t apply to them? It’s reckless and dangerous. We need stricter enforcement! #TrafficViolation #RoadSafety

part2_comparisons.video_summary: A massive multiple vehicle crash, involving numerous vehicles including large trucks, cars (such as white cars and a red hatchback), and a police car, occurred on the N12 highway near the Delmas off-ramp in South Africa. The incident took place during the morning or early hours, with poor visibility due to heavy fog identified as the primary cause. Vehicles were observed driving slowly, stopping, or parked, with some trucks illuminating their brake lights. People in high-visibility vests were present, inspecting or interacting with the vehicles. The event was captured by a vehicle-mounted camera, showing perspectives from inside a vehicle and focusing on side mirrors.
distractor_answers: A vehicle was pulled over by police for speeding in the right lane.
Heavy traffic caused a complete standstill on the motorway.
A driver was changing lanes without using a turn signal.

part2_comparisons.caption_B: Morning fog leads to a multi-vehicle crash on N12 near Delmas. 🚨 #SouthAfrica

part3_intensity_change.video_summary: A severe car accident, captured by multiple cameras, occurred in Brampton, Ontario, Canada. The key road event involved a dark-colored sports car that reportedly came flying over a fence at high speed, resulting in it being severely damaged and overturned with its front end crumpled and debris scattered. The driver and passenger of the sports car fled the scene, constituting a hit-and-run. A white Toyota Tacoma pickup truck was also involved, sustaining a detached front bumper. The incident took place near two-story brick residential houses and power lines. Bystanders were observed assessing the situation and offering assistance. The traffic violations associated with this event include speeding, reckless driving, and fleeing the scene of an accident.
part3_intensity_change.road_event_answer: A sports car crashed at high speed, and the occupants fled the scene.
distractor_answers: A police chase ended with a suspect being arrested after a crash.
A pickup truck was involved in a minor collision with a fence.
A driver was practicing stunts in a residential area.
part3_intensity_change.caption_A: A car suddenly flips over, sending debris everywhere— so unsettling to watch. People rush away, unsure what just happened. 🚗💥 #Crash #RoadDrama
part3_intensity_change.caption_B: My heart races watching this—out of nowhere, a car comes crashing over a fence, metal everywhere, people running. It’s so overwhelming. #CarCrash 😰

part3_intensity_change.video_summary: A dashcam video captured a key road event of reckless driving and dangerous lane changing at night in Toronto, Ontario, Canada, specifically on Highway 427 South near the Highway 407 exit. An SUV, identified as a Durango, performed a dangerous lane change by passing a truck on the left and then cutting sharply in front of it. The truck driver demonstrated good driving by successfully avoiding a collision. The SUV driver's actions are suspected to be due to impatience and possibly being in a rush after missing an exit. This incident involved traffic rule violations including reckless driving, illegal lane changing, and potentially speeding.
distractor_answers: Pedestrians were crossing the street outside of the designated crosswalks.
